summary: This mod adds the anvil, workbench blacksmith, sharpening stone, and three chests in the basement Proudspair Manor in Solitude.
descriptionHtml:
==================
Description:
==================

This mod adds the anvil, blacksmith workbench , sharpening stone, tanning rack and three chests in the basement Proudspair Manor in Solitude.
I use it for several months. No errors. Mod is verified with a  TESVedit. Clean. The only detail - mod removes a box of vegetables, which can not be used as storage.
Use, and if you like don\'t forget to endorse.


==================
Details:
==================

Installation:
Use any of existing managers, or just place the Proudspire_armory.esp in your /Data folder and enable. That\'s all.
Uninstallation:
Just remove Proudspire_armory.esp from your /Data folder.  

After the some time of playing this mod you can submit it in BOSS log. So after some time mode will be recognized by BOSS as known.
author: ortog

files.name: Proudspire Armory 1_1
files.changelogHtml: Added blacksmith tools to the roof of Archmage Quarters in College of Winterhold
